Building this blog

November 24, 2021

This is the first post on my blog with 11ty.

Welcome all!

This is my first blog website. I have decided to take down my initial website from euphengvue.com as that was built with stackbit. Stackbit is a jamstack nocode webapp that anyone can deploy a JAMStack within mintues.

The reason

I decided to take the time to learn how to develop a jamstack with 11ty due to the fact that I would have a better understanding of programming. In addition, I know followed this 11ty tutorial to devlop this website.

The Future

I will slowly add features to this blog website in the future.

Things to do:

  • add dark mode button
  • add profile picture

Thank you for reading this blog!
